body_html:
I i think that that’s a weird choice in numpy too.
I understand trying to keep as much compibility to numpy as possible, but at the same time additional cleaner functions would be a nice idea. Call it diagonal or n_diagonal or other ways, but faithfullness to numpy shouldn’t be keep to have more reasonable functions imho.

body:
I i think that that’s a weird choice in numpy too.
I understand trying to keep as much compibility to numpy as possible, but at the same time additional cleaner functions would be a nice idea. Call it diagonal or n_diagonal or other ways, but faithfullness to numpy shouldn’t be keep to have more reasonable functions imho.
